extendedInfo.description: This application is designed based on human memory rules. By using this software, a student can practise the Chinese voice (or English voice), and set review time at expected date.  Expired Sentences means certain sentences reach the time of appearing for refresh (repeat).The interval of sentences appearing for review (repeats) can be set by the student with one-button click. For more proficient sentences the interval time can be set for a longer period.When student opens this software, only expired sentence will be appear for student to refresh again. free to try 30 Situational Dialogues Sentences built in.CD Quality Real Person Pronunciations for both Chinese and English.
